column12: G-CSF THERAPY AS AN ADJUNCT TO REPERFUSION THERAPY IN THE TREATMENT OF ACUTE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION
column15: MEHTA JAYESH;;SINGHAL SEEMA;;DAVIDSON CHARLES;;BEOHAR NIRAT;;BONOW ROBERT

column12: G-CSF THERAPY AS AN ADJUNCT TO REPERFUSION THERAPY IN THE TREATMENT OF ACUTE MYOCARDIAL INFARCTION
column13: The present invention relates to methods of using Granulocyte Colony Stimulating Factor (G-CSF) polypeptide in conjunction with reperfusion therapy in the treatment of acute myocardial infarction or other ischemic events. This treatment can be used alone or in combination with other well-known methods of treatment.

column12: G-CSF therapy as an adjunct to reperfusion therapy in the treatment of acute myocardial infarction
column13: The present invention relates to methods of using Granulocyte Colony Stimulating Factor (G-CSF) polypeptide in conjunction with reperfusion therapy in the treatment of acute myocardial infarction or other ischemic events. This treatment can be used alone or in combination with other well-known methods of treatment.
